snippet.title: Legends of Callasia: The Stoneborne - Official Trailer (PC/Mac/Mobile)
snippet.description:
Legends of Callasia’s first expansion pack is here, centered around a new playable Faction: the Dwarves, also known as the Stoneborne. 

As the Great Callasian War rages above, and more and more factions are drawn into the conflict, the Stoneborne have decided the time is ripe to retreat to their ancestral homelands deeper in the earth in the hollow cavern kingdoms of The Great Dark. What horrors, adventures, and treasures shall they find in these ancient lands? Only the bravest and stoutest warriors will ever know. 

The new DLC contains as much content as 1/3 of the main game, including: 
* An All New 10-Level Single-Player Campaign 
* 11 Playable Stoneborne Heroes 
* Improved Stoneborne Units, including new Artillery 
* New Hero Trait: Sapper 
* New Enemy Faction: the Cavespawn 
* 20 New Maps for Skirmish and Multiplayer 
* Underground Seasons: Sprout, Spore, and Wilt 
* Over 20 New Cards such as Dwarf Fury, Blizzard, Territorial Oppression, and more! 
* New Player Emblems 
* New Achievements

LINKS:
* Website: http://legends.boomzap.com/about
* App Store Page: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1055987925
* Steam Store Page (Main Game): http://store.steampowered.com//app/438920
* Steam Store Page (DLC): http://store.steampowered.com/app/543090
* Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups
* Discord: https://discord.me/legendsofcallasia
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/boomzaplegends
* Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/boomzapcallasia
* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/boomzapgames
* Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/legendsofcallasia
* Press Kit/Screenshots: http://legends.boomzap.com/press
* More Boomzap games: http://www.boomzap.com
